text:
This man is so low class and irresponsible that:
 Still doing an ode to #chloroquine
 Implies that @CamilaPitanga lied.
 She wasn't in Leblon when she got #malaria, she was in a forest area in São Paulo and showed her exams.
 WTF can't take it anymore.  https://t.co/Oy1aUkMXZd https://t.co/ezu0anFf64
